title: Less RP now for my money? Why?
body: I was just about to go buy some RP from the clients store, just $10, no biggie, but then I realized the amount of RP I'll get has dropped significantly, it was 1100 for years I believe, 1040 initially than a bonus 60 for free, now its only 900 rp with a bonus 75 rp, making it only 975 for $10???? And I can't even find any post about this? Have I missed something? Can someone tell me please wtf is up with this drastic drop in rp we get for our money???

replies.body:
The short answer is the new digital goods and services tax (GST) that various countries including AU and NZ have implemented.

The official announcement is here: https://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/store-update/rp-update-cost-and-refunds
